content.detailedDescription:
Nov. 22, 2013  7:15pm overlooking the queen mary and grissom island in long beach, ca   sorry i  got scared and turned off the camera!
my sister and i were watching tv when we saw these lights coming over the palos verdes penninsula and flying over grissom island  and the queen mary .  we thought planes/helicopters but they were flying too close and too many.  chinese balloons with candles?  we don't know and this has been bothering us.  any ideas?  this area is within the devil's triangle - catalina island, long beach and los angeles.
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i noticed the brightest object in the sky. notice it was moving very fast, then reversed direction very fast, then speed up and turn immediately and stopped. very erratic. i contacted the local sheriff dept.
they said they saw it. also contacted an airline pilot and he saw it too. again tonight it's back doing the same movements. i also called kxan tv  and they said other people had reported it to them as well. the tv station doesn't know who to call on this issue. i hope you can help.
content.summary: Speed up fast, turn abruptly, reverse, go in circles, stop

content.detailedDescription: There is a perfect cloud circle around the moon but at a much lower altitude.
content.summary: Halo

content.detailedDescription:
I was taken through the wall or closet.  was in a room that was very bright.  it seemed like sheets or deviders.  they where tall, had on what looked like robes.  they had masks with big eyes.
this happened several times as a child.  i was not afraid of them and do not remember ever being harmed.
later in life they came back.  i could not move or speek.  they came but i thought they looked like ghosts. i could hear but not understand.  dont know if they took me or just looked at me but i was afraid.
have had headaches and ringing in my ears.  hard time consetrating.  want to isolate.

this has gone on sence i was about 5.  they have not been here for a while but yhey will be back.

i have tryied to talk to a few about this but they dont beleive me.
content.summary: Taken

content.detailedDescription: My husband was driving home from a meeting at dusk and saw the bright blue/white light streaking across the northern sky from west to east.
content.summary: Bright blue/white light streaking across sky

content.detailedDescription: this is the third time i have been abducted and this time they told me to tell all of you they are coming back. they are going to land and present themselves to the people who believe so they ask me to tell you please come to the landing spot on march 3rd. it will be in the mojave desert at 1 am. we are going to meet at the ihop and then i will lead the people to the landing spot about 8 miles away. make sure to bring all your money with you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Blimp,   Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cross,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: I was abducted and told they are coming back

content.detailedDescription: My 15 year old daughter, 7 year old niece, and myself witnessed this event.  we were driving on highway 47 approaching alpine drive.  my daughter noticed some lights in the sky.  we drove in the direction of the lights.  we stopped the car in a neighborhood that is backed by a wooded area along the rum river.  we saw 2 of the objects actually leave the ground.  at take off, they were red and chevron shaped.  as they ascended, a red trail of light followed.  the objects then reached the sky, changing into fireball shapes that were yellow/orange in color.  there were approximately 6-8 objects.  they floated around for a minute or so.  at this point, they lined up in a row and began to follow each other across the sky.  we then got in our car and followed.  we reached a point where we were right below the objects as they passed over.  they did not make any noise at all.  we watched as they proceeded through the sky and disappeared in the distance.  we only had my niece's ipod with us, but we took videos (in 4 parts) using her ipod. we were overly excited on the video portion, as we were seeing this activity happen (sorry for the midwestern excitement).
content.summary: Witnessed by myself, daughter, and niece:  saw red chevron objects leave ground,change shape to fireball (color orange/yellow), ascend into sky, line up, and follow each other across sky (no sound).

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room looking out the window when suddenly something appeared in the night. it was dimmer than all the rest of the stars. i watched it for about 10 minutes. it was in the some spot for a long time. then suddenly it grew brighter and brighter. soon (about 5 secs.) it was brighter than all the other stars! it looked like it gained a little elevation and zoomed off like a rocket. i felt really freaked out so i went to sleep and tried to get it out of my mind.
content.summary: Very silver and very bright

content.detailedDescription:
On a thursday at 10:50pm my room mate called me from a nearby appleby's and had me go out to my driveway where i saw an approx. 30ft bright red light hovering in the sky about a mile away from both our povs. looking to be about 500ft altitude. light stayed constant, no pulsing. my room mate was able to see top of a disk shape directly below the light as though the light was an upper part of this disk. we both stayed on the phone with each other til the light winked out. warm night about 70 degrees. nothing special about the area over which it was hovering, a populated part of town (actually right over a friends house as it looked) but i guess that usually the case. 

additionaly 1/10/14, 2 blacked out non-military helicopters flying formation over rutland vt. first headed south then were seen returning north 10 minutes later. also seen by a few ppl i know in town.
content.summary: 2 witness at 2 locations, we saw a large round red light, with the suface of a disk reflecting slightly,  watched for about 12 minutes then it winked out.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw bright ball of light traveling at high rate of speed far out at about 50 degrees above the horizon. (estimation mach 2+), clear skies, however the ball looked hazy and glowy. it pulsed at irregular intervals, slowing down at one point then gaining velocity and completely disappearing. 

less than 3 min later a flash and ball of light appeared and hovered straight to the south from my deck at about 80 degrees above the horizon high up. the ball grew slowly and glowed then completely disappeared into the darkness. it appeared to have the same hazy glow as the 1st object which struck me given the lack of clouds in the area. 

my aviation background and experience lockheed martin and portland international airport i've been able to deduce that the object was not.

a. commercial aircraft.
b. residential
c. military aircraft from surrounding areas (we have normal traffic out here, c17s, black hawks, etc)
d. a meteor, the object pulsed at irregular intervals and at one point slowed, then sped up rapidly into the distance. 
e. a satellite. i tracked the noaa and all other satellites in the area. the noaa that follows a similar orbit to the sighting of the first sighting could not have been the object due to the position of the horizon, it's velocity, irregular pulse, time of pass over, and possible reappearance as object #2. 

was reluctant to report this although the subject has been of main interest for many years. this is the first sighting that in my mind i would consider un-deniable in my eyes. given the mass amounts of sightings over the past few weeks on the west coast i decided to report it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: 2 objects within 3 minutes of each other. one est mach 2 +, irregular glowing pulse. the other hovering silent.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from savannah to statesboro. i noticed a black object in the sky far off in the distance didn't really give it much thought. the object from my view seemed to be almost directly in between the two highways. it was not until i drove closer that i started to become curious. the object was directly over my car and was slowly spinning. the object was black, daisy shaped, and had long cut in grooves. yhere was no sign of a portal on the bottom. the object then moved toward the tree line slowly. the hieght of the object was right over the tree line.
content.summary: Daisy shaped, 2pm bright day

content.detailedDescription: During a field goal during a football game two glowing object were very high in the sky. the objects were hovering very close to each other.
content.summary: Two glowing objects hovering very close to each other

content.detailedDescription: Was at my house,outside,looking at the stars.Thought it was a star at first,then it began flashing several different colors.Was mesmerized by it.Got the rest of the family to come and see so they also witnessed it.We got out the telescope and was able to see it a little clearer.It looked like a white clear surface spherical shaped with approximately 10 to 12 smaller circles that were spinning inside it! the colors of the lights we saw were purple,blue,green,red,yellow,white,and orange. after the kids and husband went inside,i observed an orange orb in the treeline behind a building across from our house.Is not the first time i have saw the orange orb in the trees.
content.summary: Pulsating star like object

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at my home in pottsville, i looked in the sky like i always do and i saw what i thought was a star. very bright. and then it moved,  it was pretty high in the northern sky, it moved to the east about 4inches and stopped. it sat there for about 2-3 seconds and moved about 4 inches again to the east and stopped. it sat there for about a second or so and shot off to the north i lost sight of it in less than a second. when it went north it was from a stop 45 degree turn, when it took off it was very fast and seemed to have turned yellow/orange as it faded.

that was it. the date was 1-8 and the time 635am
content.summary: Star moving east stopped, moved east again stopped 45 degree turn went to the north very fast.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were going out for a few last minute shopping items when i noticed all these lights in the sky. when observing closer we noticed these orange red orbs floating and glowing beautifully. they were all lined up in a line but slowly moving as if apart of a flock. upon observing their brilliance they started to fade out one by one, slowly and gracefully as if on a dimmer switch. when they all finally faded after a few moments we couldn't wrap our heads around what we had seen. i have noticed they are very similar to the phx lights sighting in the 90's.
content.summary: When leaving i noticed strange lights in the sky. orange red orbs glowing... 4-5 in a line. the line distorted as they moved and faded.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been life long abductee, myfirst memory was around five. have been visited my entire life . many visits.  contact me for the whole ordeal.I could write a book. including livenews reports from  channel 2 news in kaukauna wi. in 1975
..
content.summary: Life time abducty.Was offered my offsring to hold and calm. returned to entity with a gratuitus nod . iam a lifetme abducty

content.detailedDescription: I drive a tractor-trailer for fedex express at the memphis, tn. hub location. i was dropping a trailer at the hub on saturday 1-11-14 around 8:40 pm. it was a crystal clear night with a half moon (which was behind me at the time of the sighting). i looked up as i always do on a beautiful starry night and thought i was seeing a long line of birds or geese. the line was moving when i saw the long line start iluminating a pulsating light and i realized i was not seeing a line of birds but a long cylinder or cigar shaped craft of some sort. the light was coming from inside it appeared. as the light pulsated i could see what i would describe as black hash marks or slashes like this /   /    /    /    / all along the shape but spaced out. the object made absolutely no sound.!!!!! it was very long and blacked out stars as it passed in front of them. it disapeared for about 5 seconds and then started iluminating again only to appear much further away and not nearly as long in length as before. it still had same characteristics as before....Just much smaller.....Then it was gone. the entire event lasted about 20 seconds. i have been around airports and aircraft all of my life.........I have never seen anything like it. it should not have been up in the air based on my knowlege of flight. this was not some atmospheric anomoly. it was not birds or a light reflecting off something. this was a craft of some sort. i can not tell you what it was......I wish i knew. i can only describe what i saw..............You tell me !!!!! i have no pictures and i have no proof other than i told my dispatcher seconds after the sighting. the dispatcher can verify that. i also told a friend when i arrived at home around 11:15 (2315). those are the only 2 i told about this because i do not want to bring attention to myself.
content.summary: Long cylinder or cigar shape pulsating a brownish yellow light with black hash marks no sound

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting in the backyard by a fire when i was noticing what appeared to be 2 stars below the moon. i then noticed that the lower star started moving left to right and quickly noticed another star-like light below it suddenly appear and seem to be moving in unison. at that point i called it to my daughter's attention and said "look at those lights, they are moving" she immediately saw what i was referring to and right then a third light appeared to the left of the first two and the three moved together in formation for a few seconds before suddenly dissappearing one after the other. i was sure that they were too high to be airplanes and were not flashing or blinking. they had the appearance of stars but moved way too slow to be shooting stars. my daughter said right away "what the heck was that, that wasn't normal, did we just see ufo's?" i am not sure we didn't.
content.summary: Saw what appeared to be star, suddenly started moving e to se then joined by a 2nd starlike object. joined by 3rd trailing to the left. dissappeared suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: Family was returning home from a quick trip into town.  as we entered our subdivision in the southwest side of lubbock we noticed bright lights in the sky.  these lights were multiple colors and very bright.  they almost sparkled!  unlike any kind of aircraft lights we have ever seen.  the lights appeared to be coming from only one sort of flying object and appeared to be moving west.  it almost sparkled like a large star that appeared to be getting close to us.  we stopped in the car to get a good look at it and noticed it appeared to be moving closer to our direction.  the lights were bright and the colors appeared to be flashing randomly and not in a pattern like you would see on a helicopter or commercial flight.  we were just a few blocks from our home when we noticed this in the sky.  my son said that he saw the object move at a very high rate of speed and then appeared to just stop in the sky.  we were so amazed at what we were looking at that we quickly parked in the parking lot at a nearby school to watch the object.  at this time now the objest appeared to move to a se direction and stop in the sky.  we did feel excited at what we were seeing because we had never encountered a flying object that moved and had colors like this.  after watching this for approximately 10 minutes it appeared to travel to a certain point and then appeared to move away from us.  what was so unusual was that approximately at this time there was a plane that flew in front of us traveling north in the distance and we compared the two objects.  the plane had a red flashing light with a pattern  and this object had multiple lights that did not appear to have a set pattern.  also, we used a street light as a reference to the approximate angle of where this craft was at this time and it stayed at almost a perfect angle even when it appeared to be getting father away unlike the plane that was flying north at this time.  it also appeared to stay at one point for some time before appearing smaller, yet at the same angle.  we pulled our phones out and attempted to record what we were seeing, but we were unable to get a clear image of this object.
content.summary: Bright, multicolored, random light pattern object with unusual flight direction seen in southwest lubbock, tx

content.detailedDescription: The most interesting thing about this event was that i had a vision of the ufo several weeks prior to the sighting. the vision was of the same ufo exploding over a forest and flattening all the trees in its path. i went out to a lake at three am a few weeks later and i saw a small red dot in the sky that approached me. i squinted my eyes at it when it got somewhat close and it changed from red to a shade of orange. after that it made a u-turn and was gone.
content.summary: Ufo approached, changed colors, made u-turn and left.

content.detailedDescription:
Picture was taken by a game camera.

object was not in the picture taken 30 seconds before or after.
content.summary: Object looks like a robot with two legs a small main area with a camera underneath.

content.detailedDescription: I was tidying my  mom's kitchen and went to straighten the covers on the 2 chairs by the window. i looked out the window and noticed 6 red lights above the mountain side facing north east. they were large enough that i could make out a shape. they were large orbs. i looked at the time as i thought it was oddly early to see such a sight. it was 10:15pm. the red orbs seemed to be placing themselves in to patterns. i thought it looked like constellation shapes. after i got over my surprise, i ran and got my husband from next door. praying they wouldn't leave before i could get him a window. we ran to our son's bedroom window because the view from there was ideal. we also brought our telescope but decided that it was easier not to use it at that point. we saw at least another 6 to 8 again starting by hovering in the treeline, ascending into the sky at airplane level (maybe slightly closer), then purposely moving into various angles. when a new orb moved up another orb would flicker, move into another angle and then disappear. it was all very methodical and purposeful. no random movements at all. no smoke or light streaks, just simply vanishing. the orbs eventually stopped at 10:49pm. i have tried to look for the lights each night since but have not had the good fortune of seeing them again.
content.summary: At least 12 red orb like lights hovering in treeline then ascending and making geometric patterns

we where looking at the stars
a shooting star
it was moveigreally fast and another one was going right trod sit 
scared but interested
we ran inside
content.summary: Was moving very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I just check the video, me surfing, than appear this ufo
content.summary: I just check the video, me surfing, than appear this ufo

content.detailedDescription: Son was coming home from work and saw this light. it does seem odd and thought maybe others may have seen and reported it. evening of january 8th.
content.summary: Driving down i77 observed and photographed odd bright light

content.detailedDescription: 1- was cleaning the oven i brought the steel grates outside to wash 2- looked to the left and i saw a black rectangle ufo 15ft away hovering 5in over the grass very fast it went to 7ft in the air then took off at a 45 degree angle bending light with a black swirl behind it that lasted a blink of an eye with no sound i was scared and spooked ran into the house locked down told my family no one goes out side tonight this was at 7:30pm then at 7:45pm it returns for about 8sec hovers in the front yard this time looking at us 10ft from the 1st fl windows got out a tape measure to make sure i have the facts  ufo probe rectangle none reflective black 5ft long 4ft high 4ft width bends light on take off no sound these aliens must be a million years ahead of us crap. ps i did find a 2nd party analog video of exactly what i saw so i am not the only one.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw black rectangle ufo in front and back yard no joke 15ft in my face

content.detailedDescription:
I was lying in bed watching the fireworks on new years. myrle was up and about taking pictures out for the bedroom window of the fireworks over las vegas which is 16 miles away from our home. we have an unobstructed view of the entire las vegas valley. fyi, we do see the mountains and sky and valley from our bed.

she alerted my attention to a glowing orange red ball coming over sloan canyon southwest of us. the direction was from california to utah. the object was flying low at approximately 2000 feet.

i got up from the bed and we both watched as the phenomena passed by us and then went up into the sky and disappeared. 

as we were trying to figure out what we just saw another one came over the exact same path. this was very close to us, less than a mile and at about 2000 feet altitude. it was round, and i saw the pulsated energy with in and flames evenly over the top as if it were from a gas burner on a stove. they were blue, red, flames that appear to be 5 feet tall spread evenly over the top of the object going up as the object floated peacefully through the valley past our house and then changed direction going up into the sky and disappeared at approximately 8,000 ft. the second one was very close, and as i watched in disbelief, a lot of things went through my head and i do not know what i was looking at, i stared deeply into the object. i followed the entire path. we are 11 days later and i am not ok about what i saw. i have emailed, called and spoken with peter davenport twice, nasa, faa, nellis, george knapp, and henderson executive airport. we did not see lights dancing in the sky; we saw the objects close and with certainty. i am loosing sleep and i want to know what i saw. it is not a possibility that someone does not know what is going on. two many people saw this on new years and it s about time that we are told what this was. i can say with certainly, if i grabbed my medium format camera, we would have pictures that would reveal a ufo. personally, having been given the phone number from nellis and the faa to call peter davenport seems to me that this is a poor excuse to get rid of the people reporting and shunning any responsibility to be accountable as they have to know what this was and what is going on. 

myrle took two pictures with her smart phone. the second was taken at 12:04:26 am jan 1st 2014.
content.summary: Both my partner and i watched two ufo's close up.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It came in light blue from the clouds then got green . i'm at a distance of 4 miles from the object when it came into sight, and was over kingsland going up and down and heading west thru the middle of town . green with small red light on the front of green.
content.summary: Light size of a pea

content.detailedDescription: This large object was hovering motionless over a major highway near a radio station, wedg 103.3. when first observed, i believed it to be a commercial airliner on a landing flight path to buffalo niagara international airport. but it never moved, we were traveling home on nys i90 in cheektowaga ny at the time near the galleria mall. i've often seen jet airliners on landing paths in that area so i assumed that's what it was. but i was driving, and my wife disagreed with me right away! she snapped this picture of the object with out sanyo xacti cam. it's not the best camera in the world, but has provided us with many great pictures! there was a massive night time thruway repair going on at the same time. the nearby roadway was lit very brightly for the nys dot work crews. we were petrified, but this was not our first ufo sighting. it was the first we could share with a picture to prove it!
content.summary: This large object was hovering motionless over a major highway near a radio station.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving through south greensburg after dinner and she was like what the hell is that? and pointed out the window so i looked out and there was 3 orbs flying in a straight line real slow, they were white or yellow. we didn't get a picture, i told her to take a picture w/ her cell phone but she didn't want to. they didn't seem to be real high up maybe 40 - 60ft up. she seems to be in denial maybe because she's embarrassed or something.
content.summary: 3 orbs
